bibdk:contentNote.bibdk:contentNoteElement: Symphony no. 2, 4th Movement: Allegro sanguineo / Carl Nielsen. Prelude op. 174, no. 6: To the seagulls and the cormorants / Vagn Holmboe. Requiem for Nietzsche, part four: Ecce homo; Weimar / Vagn Holmboe. Borderlines - violin concerto no. 2, 1st Movement / Per Nørgård. Piano concerto, 1st Movement: Grazioso / Poul Ruders. Canon and chorale / Niels Rosing-Schow. On this planet: Lucid King: two mobiles. I'll buy you chocolate / Anders Nordentoft. Ritornelli al contrario: Calmo. Allegretto ritmico con moto / Karsten Fundal
